document.full_text: ugandan opposition leader kizza besigye, president yoweri museveni's closest rival in february elections, was injured while taking part in a protest against high food and fuel prices, he said on thursday.
document.title: uganda opposition leader injured during protest
lines_and_colors: ugandan opposition leader kizza besigye, president yoweri museveni's closest rival in february elections, was injured while taking part in a protest against high food and fuel prices, he said on thursday.
